snippet: A company has developed a camera-based system intended to give the visually impaired the ability to both “read” easily and move freely.
abstract: Israeli start-up OrCam develops a small camera-based computer system intended to give visually impaired the ability to both read and walk easily by recognizing text and speaking it to the user; technology is representative of wide range of rapid improvements made in field of artificial intelligence.
lead_paragraph: A company has developed a camera-based system intended to give the visually impaired the ability to both “read” easily and move freely.

headline.seo: Israeli Start-Up Gives Visually Impaired a Way to Read
headline.main: Device From Israeli Start-Up Gives the Visually Impaired a Way to Read
headline.print_headline: Device From Israeli Start-Up Gives The Visually Impaired a Way to Read
